name: Starfire
overview: STARFIRE: RID THE GALAXY OF THE XTARDAN BATTLE CRUISERS - A GAME OF STRATEGY AND SKILL by Martyn Charles Davis. You are Commander of the only remaining EARTH SPACE AGENCY ship in the entire galaxy. The rest of your fleet has been wiped out by a powerful alien force leaving you to navigate the galaxy and destroy the alien fighters single-handed. The future of civilization depends on you. You must succeed!
